title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple command-line interface.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama that provides a simple Pythonic interface to interact with Ollama models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript library for Ollama that enables integration with Node.js and browser applications.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama that allows using Ollama models within LangChain applications.

title: ollama-webui
summary: A beautiful web UI for Ollama that provides a ChatGPT-like interface for interacting with local models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java library for Ollama that provides a Java client for interacting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby on Rails integration for Ollama that provides easy model integration in Rails applications.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line interface for Ollama with additional features and improved UX.

title: ollama-desktop
summary: Desktop application for Ollama built with Electron, providing a native app experience.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that integrates Ollama models as AI coding assistants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm charts for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with proper scaling and monitoring.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama that enables using Ollama models in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that integrates Ollama models for AI-powered note-taking and text generation.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter for Ollama that provides auto-configuration and easy integration.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET library for Ollama that provides C# client for interacting with Ollama models.
